resources.string:
This is a map client reading from sqlite and rendering in openGL es2. Map projects are stored in sqlite databases with the .tileless file ending. There can also be multiple more sqlite databases with data referenced from the project db.
 
 You can find a few databases that are ready to use at:
 https://tilelessmap.org/maps
 
 To create your own maps take alook at:
 https://github.com/TilelessMap/pg_tileless
You need a map project to open
